content: अश्मकः [अश्मेव स्थिरः, इवार्थे कन्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sage. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country in the south; तथाश्मकाः पुलिंदाश्च कलिंगाश्च विशेषतः <ls>Rām.</ls>; (probably an old name of Travancore); according to <ls>Bṛ. S. 14. 22</ls> it is in the north-west. {@--3@} The inhabitants of the country (<ab>pl.</ab>). {@--4@} A part of the साल्व country or its inhabitants; or its king.
अश्मक An old name of Travancore.
